context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: apply for financial assistance from public health programs, charities or pharmaceutical companies

borrow the money from friends or family, set up a crowdfunding campaign or explore patient assistance programs that may offer the medication at a reduced cost or for free
approach charitable organizations or pharmaceutical companies that offer patient assistance programs which may be able to assist with the costs of the medication
start a crowdfunding campaign or fundraiser to raise the necessary funds
rob a pharmacy or the pharmaceutical company to get the needed medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

call for a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride-sharing service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, rideshare service, or roadside assistance

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. take out $50

pay the missing amount out of his own pocket

pay out of his own pocket to replace the missing money
replace the missing amount from his own pocket

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: gather his group and make a plan to ration what little food and water they have left
start rationing whatever food and water they have left among everyone

use his survival knowledge to aid the group until help arrives
try and find a water source nearby, such as a stream or river, and use his remaining gear to make a temporary shelter

start rationing their existing supplies
begin rationing their remaining supplies, trying to make them last longer
build a shelter for the group to protect them from the elements
gather everyone together to discuss their situation and to strategize their next steps
